name: Storm
description: Rave, and do not stop ! One mistake can cost your life.

passive: On spell cast, increases SKILL DMG and crit chance by 4% for 6 seconds. Stacks up to 3 times

name: Wings of Night Lord
description: Wings of the one who reigns over the night

passive: On skill cast, empowers next attack
Next attack deals (MAIN STAT X 2 + AGI X 1.5) pure damage
Can crit based on user's critical chance
Empowered attack stacks Madness of Night
For 8 seconds increases AGI by 120 (stacks up to 10 times)
Once max stacks is reached, user can no longer gain more for duration but gains 10% damage output

name: Cape of Deep Abyss
description: The great old one awaits you..

passive: On direct hit, activates Drowning Abyss
Deals 15% of effect's damage over 5 seconds
Increases target's magic DMG TAKEN by 6 ~ 9% (increases based on amount of time target is debuffed, max at 15 seconds)
If target dies while debuffed it explodes and deals (MAIN STAT X 30) pure damage to nearby enemies
active: On use, manually activates explosion on targets that have max reduction stacks

name: Wings of Immortal
description: You probably won't die with this wing.

passive: While in combat, every 3 seconds increases MAIN STAT by 30 for a max of 1500
On death, revives user
Cooldown: 180 seconds, cannot be dropped during cooldown

name: Soul Devourer
description: All souls are merely my prey..

passive: Every 5 seconds restores 10% max HP and max MP to user
active: On use, activates Soul Swallow
Cleanses debuffs from user
Restores 40% max HP
Cooldown: 40 seconds, cannot be dropped during cooldown

name: Ring of Healed
description: Ring that frees you from the passage of ||HEALED||

passive: If HP drops below 1, Gives you a text that says HEALED but thats it.
active: On use, activates Time Distortion resetting it's own cooldown, but only once.
Cannot be dropped

name: Essence of Air
description: "then suffer"
